summary:
SHARVESH R
+91 98435 14513 rsharvesh16@gmail.com -linkedin.com/in/rsharvesh16 - github.com/rsharvesh16
EDUCATION
SRM Institute of Science and Technology Chennai,TamilNadu
B.Tech, Information Technology (CGPA: 9.67) September2022-May2026
Army Public School Chennai,TamilNadu
Class 12 - PCM (Percentage: 81.2) April2021-March2022
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Programming: Python, C, C++, HTML, CSS, SQL
Libraries and Tools: Flask, Django, RestAPI, Postgres, PG Vector, AWS-Bedrock, Textract, Git, GitHub, VS Code
ML and Architectures: Regression, Large Language Models, RAG, Agents, Transformers(GPT)
WORK EXPERIENCE
Data Science Intern
Nexyom, Folsom, California, USA Jan2025-Present
• Currently working on developing AI and LLM-based products for the healthcare and startup industries to enhance
operational efficiency and business growth.
• Engaging in research and development of AI-driven applications for medical data processing and decision support
systems while collaborating with cross-functional teams to deploy AI models into production environments.
• Tech Stacks: Python, Agents, LLMs, Generative AI, NLP, AWS Bedrock, Azure, FastAPI, React, GitHub Actions, Git
AI Engineer Intern
Global Info Technologies, Tamil Nadu, India July2024-September2024
• Developing a comprehensive AI product using AWS Bedrock open source models, including Text2Text, Text2Img,
Text2Code, Img2Text and Retrieval Augmented Generation functionalities.
• Conducted research and experimentation with cutting-edge AI tools and models, including implementing vector
embeddings with FAISS for a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) application.
• Tech stacks: AWS Bedrock, Python, Streamlit, Vector Embeddings - FAISS, Hugging Face Transformers, Google
Generative AI API, OpenAI API, Git, GitHub.
Junior Developer Intern
Innotech Titans, Tamil Nadu, India September2023-Present
• Designed and developed Prompt2Flow, a platform allowing users to submit prompts and receive flowcharts and
other diagrams for visual representations.
• Achieved a significant 60% improvement in prompt-to-diagram conversion efficiency, greatly enhancing the user
experience by streamlining the representation process and reducing the time required for generating accurate
visual diagrams. Implemented API automation to optimize research, which increased speed.
• Tech Stacks: Python, Flask, Streamlit, RestAPI, Google Generative AI API, Mermaid JS, GUI-Tkinter, Git, GitHub.
PROJECTS AND HACKATHONS
• PredictIt : Next Gen Crop Prediction, Led a team in a national hackathon, developing a Crop Yield Prediction
System with 99.8% accuracy using Random Forest, winning first prize. Integrated Deep Learning for crop disease
detection and an AI chatbot for agricultural queries. GitHub
• ResqAI : Emergency Companion, Built an AI tool for real-time weather forecasts, earthquake data, disaster
analysis, and AI-generated emergency response plans using AI Models and LLMs for up-to-date news. Won third
prize in the Project Day contest. GitHub
• RAGify - Retrieval Augmented Generation Using AWS, Implemented using AWS Bedrock Titan Embeddings for
generating and storing embeddings in FAISS, with a Streamlit app for querying PDF documents and providing
detailed answers using LLM models like LLama3, Mistral, and Amazon Titan Text. GitHub
• SmartDoc: Intelligent Document Processing with LLM Integration, SmartDoc is an intelligent document
processing system that leverages OCR and LLM integration to convert, analyze, and extract valuable information
from PDFs. GitHub
CERTIFICATIONS
• NPTEL - Programming, Data Structures And Algorithms Using Python
• HackerRank - Python (Basic)
ACHIEVEMENTS
• Academic Excellence - Ranked Top 3 in 2nd Semester with 9.76 GPA - May 2023
• Coding - Ranked 9877 out of 100000+ Candidates in Codekaze by Coding Ninjas and Naukri - September 2023
